name: Essenza Day Spa
overview:
Essenza is a full service Day Spa well known for our customized airbrush tanning, unique service menu and exceptional customer service.

Our services include, facials, massage, inch loss detoxifying body wraps, body scrubs, waxing, semi-permanent lash extensions, makeup application, airbrush tanning and cosmetic teeth whitening. We provide all services either in the spa or for your convenience, at a location of your choice.

We would welcome the opportunity to earn your trust and deliver you the best service in the industry.
